page.title: 01The Great Bromley District
page.content: {Great Bromley}is a small village in North East Essex, about 9 kilometres from the town of Colchester. The surrounding area is mainly {farmland}and woodland. There are many arable farms and a poultry farm. The village is very quiet. The houses and other buildings are scattered. The new A120 road ,to the port of Harwich ,was built 5km. away, but the narrow roads in the village have very{little traffic.} The public transport is very poor. Only{3 buses per day}pass through the two main villages of Little Bentley and Great Bromley.These are operated by the Eastern National Bus Company. In the centre of Great Bromley is St.Georges Church, which most villagers attend on Sundays. We conducted a{survey}of 31 villagers via children at the local school.
